trans-unit.source: Register now for a developer account so you can get your apps into the Windows Store and participate in other Microsoft programs.
trans-unit.target: Register now for a developer account so you can get your apps into the Windows Store and participate in other Microsoft programs.

trans-unit.source: Register now for a developer account so you can get your apps into the Windows Store and participate in other Microsoft programs.
trans-unit.target: Register now for a developer account so you can get your apps into the Windows Store and participate in other Microsoft programs.

trans-unit.source: We offer [individual and company accounts in locations around the world](account-types-locations-and-fees.md).
trans-unit.target: We offer [individual and company accounts in locations around the world](account-types-locations-and-fees.md).

trans-unit.source: Check out our [overview of the sign-up process](opening-a-developer-account.md) to see how it works.
trans-unit.target: Check out our [overview of the sign-up process](opening-a-developer-account.md) to see how it works.

trans-unit.source: Have a name for your app?
trans-unit.target: Have a name for your app?

trans-unit.source: As soon as you open your developer account, you can [create your app by reserving a name](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/JJ657967).
trans-unit.target: As soon as you open your developer account, you can [create your app by reserving a name](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/JJ657967).
